title: RIOT!!! [BE discussion]
body:
Before I even say anything, take a look at this picture...

I looked at the charts, went meh. I told my friends, don't worry chaps, this should be okay, your over reacting! Its not so bad, this new system. Well, now I have to eat my words after siding with charts.
Fresh off of leveling up, opening a capsule and recycling 2 shards (plus the 90 essence it gave me) and here we are.... I can't get another capsule for about 5-6 games, and it takes me about 24 hours to play 6 games... And all I need is 1 single blue essence...
My reaction was: https://i.makeagif.com/media/8-09-2015/V29OFl.gif

{{sticker:sg-soraka}} 

I REALLY Really really really really ʳᵉᵃᶫᶫʸ Don't like this new system! There's no way at all for me to make 1 Blue essence?

[I'm going to bed, that's enough league for 1 day.](https://media1.tenor.com/images/d5668af606ca4d0332a6507418cabbce/tenor.gif)

replies.body: sorry friendo. If it makes you feel better League fucked me over today too. Used up all 96 Project tokens and I got two things I already owned making this event basically worthless for me (':
That just makes me feel bad... for you.... TT~TT
